thread.title: A Film Roiling Israel Hits the U.S.

author: Rory Jones
title: A Film Roiling Israel Hits the U.S.
text:
Tel Aviv
Israeli director Samuel Maoz conceived the plot for his latest movie, “Foxtrot,” after he sent his 14-year-old daughter to school one day in 1994 on public transportation rather than by taxi as usual.
Minutes later, he heard on the radio that Palestinians from the militant group Hamas had bombed a bus on her route, killing 22 civilians.
...
